content: elevate your crochet skills with the mimosa cowl pattern designed for advanced beginners seeking a fun challenge the written pattern and video tutorial ensure a smooth crafting experience while the worked-in-the-round construction adds a professional touch add a pop of color with stripes or colorwork to make your mimosa cowl truly unique **unique features-** seamless construction for a polished look versatile sizing options for a custom fit written pattern and video tutorial for easy crafting worked in the round for a professional finish stripes/colorwork options for personalization **materials needed-** hook 6 5mm us size 10 5 yarn caron simply me bulky weight 230 yards
